about-text1: AK Pantelić-Đorđević is a recognized, leading Serbian office that provides services in all areas of commercial, civil, labor and criminal law. We are a team of experienced and dedicated lawyers and business advisors. Long tradition, reputation, proactive approach, the highest ethical standards, as well as commitment to our clients, have made us one of the fastest growing law firms in Serbia.
about-text2: We deeply appreciate the trust shown by existing and future clients, so we are constantly working to improve the quality and manner of providing our services. Our advice is clear, precise and timely.
contactarea-callusorfilltheform: Call us at +381653938585 or fill out the form.
